title: The Traitors NZ recap week one: Gather round, chickadees
content:encoded:
Dust off your fedora and polish your cane, it's time to dive into the delicious deception of The Traitors NZ. Join Jane Yee, Alex Casey and Duncan Greive as they dissect week one of Three's big new reality show, including the sun-soaked New Zealand setting, the devilish hosting style of Paul Henry and the welcome return of our godhead Colin Mathura-Jeffree. 


If you enjoy this episode and are hungry for more, then become a paid subscriber on our Substack where you’ll get one of these bonus episodes of The Real Pod every week, along with other perks.


Join the Real Pod community!

Subscribe to The Real Pod Extra on Substack

Join The Real Pod Corner on Facebook

Join our Discord server

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
